title: oce servers not working
body:
okay wait 20 mins gets in a game to find i manged to hit 12739 ping.
checked my internet and its fine so i ask everyone else in the game and they all say there getting lag spikes as well.
riot if your gonna make oce servers can you at least say when the servers will not work?

replies.body:
I'm not sure that they have someone who's monitoring the performance of the network at all times.

But it's better than not having an OCE server.
